title: Justia Elevate and Justia Connect Pro Launch Party

config: On Monday, May 9th, we had an unprecedented event at Justia. The Justia Elevate and Justia Connect Pro Launch Party! In addition to the commemorative t-shirts, everyone received fabulous party supplies in a mystery box. Everyone enjoyed the party, and the magician’s presentation was simply incredible. We want to give special thanks to the people involved in the organization and for everyone’s cooperation and enthusiastic participation.
